Meanwhile, the other twin got landed with an absolutely lovely bloke called Marcus. And the pair of them seemed such a match! Marcus & Claudia, so cute â¤. How every first date should start! Smiley and coy and lots of eye contact 
Worst chat 
Claudia went for the most terrible of all icebreakers â€“ the classic â€œheritageâ€ question. 'What's yourâ€¦ Heritage?' 
However, when we found out we couldnâ€™t help but be glad Claudia asked. #firstdates wow what a mix !!! Half Nigerian half Greek
